item.title: Kerbstone dislodged, 29th December
item.description:

item.title: 12 to 18 Cambridge Gardens, Kilburn NW6 5AY, 29th December
item.description:
Leaves and general rubbish have not been cleared since before the Christmas holiday. This section of pavement and road from 12 to 18 Cambridge Gardens is regularly left unswept for days, sometimes weeks, despite there being five huge plane trees depositing their leaves weeks ago and being the most utilised pedestrian path by a local secondary school (opposite 18) and Nursery (at 12) All other pavements appear to be swept regularly except for this highly used section - residents are left to repeatedly complain about this issue

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Gardens, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned Forest bike (Abbey Road), 29th December
item.description:
